mapper.insert: insert into service (SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NBR, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_CONTENT, SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{serviceNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{extServiceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update service set
SERVICE_NBR = #{serviceNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_CONTENT = #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
EXT_SERVICE_ID = #{extServiceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select s.SERVICE_ID, s.SERVICE_NBR, s.SERVICE_NAME, s.SERVICE_CONTENT, s.SERVICE_TYPE_ID, s.EXT_SERVICE_ID, s.STATUS_CD, s.STATUS_DATE, s.CREATE_STAFF, s.CREATE_DATE, s.UPDATE_STAFF, s.UPDATE_DATE, s.REMARK, st.SERVICE_TYPE_NAME as serviceTypeName, st.SERVICE_TYPE_DESC as serviceTypeDesc from service s left join service_type st on s.SERVICE_TYPE_ID = st.SERVICE_TYPE_ID where s.SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by s.UPDATE_DATE desc

select SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NBR, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_CONTENT, SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NBR, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_CONTENT, SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service where SERVICE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{serviceName}),'%') order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select s.SERVICE_ID, s.SERVICE_NBR, s.SERVICE_NAME, s.SERVICE_CONTENT, s.SERVICE_TYPE_ID, s.EXT_SERVICE_ID, s.STATUS_CD, s.STATUS_DATE, s.CREATE_STAFF, s.CREATE_DATE, s.UPDATE_STAFF, s.UPDATE_DATE, s.REMARK, st.SERVICE_TYPE_NAME as serviceTypeName, st.SERVICE_TYPE_DESC as serviceTypeDesc from service s left join service_type st on s.SERVICE_TYPE_ID = st.SERVICE_TYPE_ID where 1=1
and s.SERVICE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{serviceName}),'%')
and s.SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by s.UPDATE_DATE desc
